title: FT/FS: Willis Batting EPDG SGC 45 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Willis Batting EPDG SGC 45 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Recently downgraded my Willis batting EPDG so this one is available. Looking to either trade or sell. 

Great card for the grade.....if you want the full scan, then PM me your email address.

Asking $SOLD shipped, but will listen to offers.

If you have an EPDG available for trade, let me know. EPDG HOFers I need are: Bender with trees, Chance batting, Chance red portrait, Jennings one hand, Keeler batting, McGraw glove at hip, Tinker bat off, Walsh, Wheat.

I also have other commons I need, so shoot me what you have!

[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/t206/995733D5-734D-4CBF-A236-014AFC979764.jpg[/IMG]
